abilities.name: Sneaky Theft
abilities.description: Stealth. When this attacks, steal a random card from your opponent's hand

abilities.name: Cunning Escape
abilities.description: When this would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead (once per game)

body.raw:
# Seven of Swords

The thief escapes with stolen swords, using cunning over force.

*"Sometimes the clever path beats the direct one."*
